txt.en: TBD Oh, thanks.
Mending the Wheel
'I need more coal to stoke the fire. Bring me coal from the stockpile on the crafter's wharf, near the oven.'
TBD Pick up the fixed wheel

'Getting to this wheel should not be difficult if I have meaningful help. The first thing I need is more coal to stoke the fire. There is a stockpile of coal on the crafter's wharf near the cooks' oven. Go there and bring a sack of coal to me.'
TBD Tub of water broughted
'Very good. Thank you for the coal. Next, I need more water for quenching the iron. You should be able to get a tub of water from the fishing dock.'
Bring Aranbir his lunch

'Thank you for the water. It looks like hardly any of it was spilt. Impressive. The last task I have for you is the most important. Go to Endunâm and pick up my lunch. I am less productive when I am hungry.'
The wheelwright, Aranbir, says he will make time to fix Khâmi's wheel if you fill in for his absent apprentice.
Aranbir has asked you to go to the crafter's wharf in Iridír and bring him a sack of coal that can be found near the oven.
You have brought Aranbir the tub of water for which he asked. You should talk to him to learn of your next task.

'Oh, hoi! What is this, Aranbir sent you to get him some lunch? Ah yes, a man cannot work on an empty stomach!'

Endunâm puts together a plate of food and hands it to you.

'There you are. No nibbling! Buy your own if you are hungry.'
TBD Bring the repaired wheel to TBD Waggoneer
Bring a tub of water to Aranbir
You have brought Aranbir the sack of coal for which he asked. You should talk to him to learn of your next task.
Aranbir has sent you on one last errand for him - to pick up his lunch. You should talk to Endunâm the cook on the crafter's wharf in Iridír.

'Lunch! The highlight of my day. Other than breakfast and supper, anyway. Thank you so much for helping me today. While you were gone I repaired your wheel. It is sitting just there by the hut. Help yourself.'
Aranbir has asked you to go to the fishing dock in Iridír, find a tub of water, and return with it in hand.
Talk to Aranbir
You have gotten lunch from Endunâm. You should bring it to Aranbir.
Talk to Endunâm
Collect a sack of coal and bring it to Aranbir
TBD
Talk to Aranbir
TBD
TBD fixed wheel picked up
'Fetch me a tub of water from the fishing dock. I will need it to quench the iron.'
'Go to Endunâm and pick up my lunch.'
TBD Sack of coal broughted
